text: Tyasabhanda thulo atyacariko cha, jasala'i usako palanakartaka kalama (sabdaharu) bata upadesa garincha, taipani tyo vimukha bha'irahos, ra juna karmaharu usale agadi patha'isakeko cha, tyasala'i birside'os. Nihsandeha hamile tiniharuko hrdayamathi avarana halidi'eka chaum, taki yasala'i bujhna nasakun ra kanaharuma bojha (paida garidi'eka chaum ki sunna nasakun) ra yadyapi tapa'ile uniharula'i ramro batotira bola'umchau taipani tini kahilyai sahi batoma a'une chainan
